metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8159 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is a vulnerability in actionpack_page-caching gem < v1.2.1 that allows an attacker to write arbitrary files to a web server, potentially resulting in remote code execution if the attacker can write unescaped ERB to a view.

criterions.comment: ruby-actionpack-page-caching: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
